mapper.select: insert into person( code, label, description, priority, flags, state, uid, gid, mode, acl, birthday, locale, timezone, customer, supplier, subject, bank, bankacc, gender, employee, homeland, passport, ssn, dln ) values( #{codeName},#{label},#{description}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{owner.id}, #{ownerGroup.id}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{birthday}, #{langTag}, #{timeZoneId}, #{customer}, #{supplier}, #{subject}, #{bank}, #{account}, #{gender}, #{employee}, #{homeland}, #{passport}, #{socialSecurityNum}, #{driverLicenseNum} ) returning id
